a virgins worst nightmare!

"A VIRGINS WORST NIGHTMARE!!
a virgin girl asks her boyfriend to come over Friday night

and have dinner with her parents. Since this is such a

big event, the girl announces to her boyfriend that

after dinner, she would like to go out and make love

for the first time.

* * * * * * * * *

Well, the boy is ecstatic, but he has never had sex

before, so he takes a trip to the pharmacist to get

some condoms. He tells the pharmacist it's his first time and

the pharmacist helps the boy for about an hour.

He tells the boy everything there is to know about condoms and

sex.

* * * * * * * * *

At the register, the pharmacist asks the boy how many

condoms he'd like to buy, a 3-pack, 10-pack, or family

pack. The boy insists on the family pack because he

thinks he will be rather busy, it being his first time and all.

* * * * * * * * *

That night, the boy shows up at the girl's parents

house and meets his girlfriend at the door. "Oh, I'm

so excited for you to meet my parents, come on in!"

* * * * * * * * *

The boy goes inside and is taken to the dinner table

where the girl's parents are seated. The boy quickly

offers to say grace and bows his head.

* * * * * * * * *

A minute passes, and the boy is still deep in prayer,

with his head down.

* * * * * * * * *

10 minutes pass, and still no movement from the boy.

* * * * * * * * *

Finally, after 20 minutes with his head down, the

girlfriend leans over and whispers to the

boyfriend, "I had no idea you were this religious."

* * * * * * * *

The boy turns, and whispers back, "I had no idea your

father was a pharmacist."

* * * * * * * * *

hey, just wondering something....for everybody out there should i get a lip ring b/c i want one but don't know if it'll look good on me and if ppl will like so comment me or whatever....ttyl...

Missing You

this is a song wrote by one of my friends...wanting to know what ya'll think!

There's so much to think about and alot to doubt.
I lay here in my bed all these memories running through my head.

I'm wondering where you're at and if you're thinking of me.
I close my eyes and I see your face I remember your touch and your sweet embrace.

These memories play in my mind like movies
I smile as tears run down my face
So many times I was selfish and pushed you away.
Now I wish I could go back to that one day.
Change everything I did wishing I could hold you again.

*chorus*

After the end of everyday I still feel this way.
I sit and think about how stubborn I was to let you just walk out
When I really just wanted say I'm sorry.
I was full of pride and you're not on your side.

*chorus*

Maybe someday I'll get you back again but until then...

*chorus*

let me know if there's anything that you want to change or anything you wanna say or anything!

i need to blog more!

hey everyone! i need to start blogging more on here...i havent really done much but i'm glad we got out of school for 2 weeks...that was awesome!!! i can't wait for school to be over with already! that's sad isnt it? anyways g2g...ttyl...love ya..bye!!!

today's been ok...

hey yeah today has been ok..i'm feeling much better but i'm about to go to bed! but any of ya'll are welcomed to comment me..please..i'm kinda always bored! haha...well i hope tomorrow goes well..cuz since the way my weekend went i hope it does! haha...i hope i get better cuz it's not funny for ya'll who know! well, got to go...love ya's bye!!!

hey,
today's been pretty good i woke up like a couple of hours ago...i've been lazy this weekend..oh well school is exhausting! i have the want to go shopping right now but i can't and i don't know if i'm gonna be able to go to church!? i hope i do! well, i got to go! ttyl..love ya'll...bye!!!

i'm soooo tired!

hey,
i am going to have a long day tomorrow! i have to wake up at 6:00a.m and go to russellville! then i have to be at the football game at like 6:30 p.m. and we march out at probably 7:00 then after that i'm suppose to do the 30 hour famine but i'm not too sure i am going to do it b/c i am busy all the time!!! yeah time goes by fast but we don't have to go to school tomorrow cuz today was parent teacher confrences...yeah! we get to have a 3 day weekend! whoo hoo but i better go cuz i'm exhausted! love ya..bye!!!

oh my gosh it's been forever!

i pretty much forgot that i had facebox....well...school's almost out and i can't wait...i got my nose pierced april 7th and i've been wanting it done for years now...i get to change it for the first time on the 19th of may and i can't wait....YAY! i might get to go camping that weekend with my best friend and some ppl from vo-tech which will be loads of fun! i can't wait till summer cuz i want to go swimming and get to go to the gym and work out....get in shape....yeah! i also tried out for flagline for marching season next year in band and made it so i'm really happy but i gotta work on my arm strength....lol but that's about it...ttyl...bye!

-maggi*
